SEARCH
Package boundary

Class Menu

Object
Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Main menu interface class for user interaction with the system Allows users to login, change their password or exit the program Upon login, users are redirecated to their respective role-specific menu

    • Menu

      public Menu(IApplicantService applicantService, IOfficerService officerService, IManagerService managerService, IApplicationService applicationService, IEnquiryService enquiryService, IProjectService projectService, IRegistrationService registrationService)
      Constructs Menu object with the specified services
      Parameters:
      applicantService - Service for managing applicants
      officerService - Service for managing officers
      managerService - Service for managing managers
      applicationService - Service for managing BTOApplications
      enquiryService - Service for managing enquiries
      projectService - Service for managing BTOProjects
      registrationService - Service for managing registrations
